name: BrewingRecipeRegistry
description: Starting from 1.20.5 this is used to hold IBrewingRecipe s inside of PotionBrewing . For queries, use the vanilla PotionBrewing . For registration, use RegisterBrewingRecipesEvent .

fields.name: recipes
fields.description: The field for the recipes record component.

constructors.name: BrewingRecipeRegistry
constructors.description: Creates an instance of a BrewingRecipeRegistry record class.

methods.name: getOutput
methods.description: Returns the output ItemStack obtained by brewing the passed input and ingredient.

methods.name: hasOutput
methods.description: Returns true if the passed input and ingredient have an output

methods.name: isValidIngredient
methods.description: Returns true if the passed ItemStack is a valid ingredient for any of the recipes in the registry.

methods.name: isValidInput
methods.description: Returns true if the passed ItemStack is a valid input for any of the recipes in the registry.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of this record class. The representation contains the name of the class, followed by the name and value of each of the record components.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Returns a hash code value for this object. The value is derived from the hash code of each of the record components.

methods.name: equals
methods.description: Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. All components in this record class are compared with Objects::equals(Object,Object) .

methods.name: recipes
methods.description: Returns the value of the recipes record component.
